title: Three ways to cut your tech spending, as prices rise everywhere - Moneycontrol
content: Three ways to cut your tech spending, as prices rise everywhere  Moneycontrol
description: Compared with the cost of gasoline, which surged 48% from March 2021 to March of this year, prices of tech products like smartphones, computers and apps are only inching upward â€” 1.3% in the same period, according to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics.
